added_to_group.en: Hello there. Run /config to change the language and enjoy the game.

change_settings_of_group.en: You want to change the settings of the group {}? Well, here you go then.

need_to_be_admin.en: You need to be an admin to do this, sorry.

need_to_start_first.en: You need to start me in private first. Please do this via the button below :)

start_game.en: Chameleon has been started! Please join the game.

start_game_already_running.en: Please use the start button beneath this message to join the game :)
